text: == Events == * Magnus VII becomes the king of Norway and unites the country with Sweden. == Births == * April 16 – King John II of France (died 1364) * King Peter IV of Aragon (died 1387) * Joanna of Dreux, Countess of Penthievre (died 1384) * Murad I, Ottoman Sultan (died 1389) * William de Bohun, 1st Earl of Northampton, English military leader (died 1360) == Deaths == * May 19 – Louis d'Évreux, son of Philip III of France (b. 1276) * Duccio, Italian painter (born 1255)
